snippet: Franklin Reyes, 17, is facing manslaughter charges in the death of a 4-year-old girl he hit in June while fleeing police officers on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Franklin Reyes, 17, is facing manslaughter charges in death of 4-year-old Ariel Russo, who was struck and killed after Reye's car jumped curb as he fled police officers on Manhattan's Upper West Side; Reyes's lawyer is seeking city records about pothole repairs at corner, pointing to street conditions as possible culprit.
lead_paragraph: Franklin Reyes, 17, is facing manslaughter charges in the death of a 4-year-old girl he hit in June while fleeing police officers on the Upper West Side.

headline.main: Teenager’s Lawyer Blames Pothole for Crash
headline.print_headline: Teenager’s Lawyer Blames Pothole for Crash
